Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Configure \Con*fig"ure\, v. t. [imp. & p. p. {Configured}; p. pr. & vb. n. {Configuring}.] [L. configurare: cf. F. configurer. See {Configurate}.] To arrange or dispose in a certain form, figure, or shape. --Bentley. [1913 Webster]
configured adj : organized so as to give configuration to; "a magnet is surrounded by a configured field"; "a vehicle designed for rough terrain" [syn: {designed}]
